name: Seeker of Allies
text: Once per turn, if you control a "Seeker" monster: You can Special Summon this card(From your hand). If this card is used for the Synchro Summon of a Dragon-type Synchro monster: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. This effect of "Seeker of Allies" can only be used once per turn.
